content: make your space out of this world with this moon pillow crochet pattern follow my step-by-step instructions to create your own cozy celestial pillow this pattern is perfect for all skill levels even if you re new to crochet you can pick your favorite yarn colors and make one or a few of these cute pillows **materials needed ** bernat blanket 220yds #6 super bulky the colors i used are burnt mustard and bright sage us size k 6 5 mm crochet hook poly-fil for stuffing stitch marker scissors tapestry needle to weave in ends you can use your choice of yarn and hook size just keep in mind that this will change the final size of your pillow
